title: Unichat-Mcp-Server
description: Unichat MCP Server allows sending requests to various AI models using the MCP protocol with tool integrations and predefined prompts.
creator: amidabuddha

UNICHAT_MODEL.description: The AI model to be used for the Unichat server, e.g., gpt-4o-mini.

UNICHAT_API_KEY.description: Vendor's API key for accessing the selected AI model.
